type.name: org.gradle.testkit.runner.UnexpectedBuildResultException
type.description: * Base class for {@link UnexpectedBuildFailure} and {@link UnexpectedBuildSuccess}. * * @since 2.9 * @see BuildResult

method.name: getBuildResult
method.description: * The result of the build execution. * * @return the result of the build execution

property.name: buildResult
property.description: * The result of the build execution. * * @return the result of the build execution
